name: Rem Arrowhead, Inc.
specialty: Community Based Residential Treatment Facility, Intellectual and/or Developmental Disabilities

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Rem Arrowhead, Inc. is a Community Based Residential Treatment Facility, Intellectual and/or Developmental Disabilities provider based in Duluth, MN. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $107.8M in Medicaid payments across 416K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: This provider received $107.8M in taxpayer-funded Medicaid payments — enough to fund healthcare for approximately 13,479 Medicaid beneficiaries for a full year at average per-enrollee costs.
